mapper.select: select u.id as id,u.goods_id as goods_id,u.sku_id as sku_id,u.num as num,u.user_id as user_id, s.id as store_id,s.name as store_name from user_buycart u,seller_store s where u.store_id = s.id and u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
